discussion.content: Secure boot prevents unauthorized software from being booted

questions.question_text: A technician needs to run a diagnostic DVD on a laptop running Windows 8.1. After setting the boot order in the UEFI BIOS to the internal DVD-RW drive, the laptop still boots into Windows. Which of the following settings needs to be adjusted in order for the laptop to boot from the DVD-RW drive?
Which of the following display technologies provides the BEST range of visible colors?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
OLED est la meilleure technologie en matière de gamme de couleurs visibles, grâce à son contraste élevé, ses noirs parfaits et sa reproduction fidèle des couleurs

Selected Answer: B
carte d'aquisition d'image ( carte de capture d'image) pour convertir l'analogique au numerique)

questions.question_text: A customer wants to transfer data from the DVR to a DVD. Which of the following should be used on a workstation in order to extract the data for archiving?

choices.B: Connect the printer by using the onboard Infrared port
choices.C: Connect the printer to a user’s workstation and share the device
choices.A: Connect the printer to a Bluetooth adapter in order for the users to print
choices.D: Connect the printer to a parallel switch box

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
partager l'imprimante dpuis le poste où elle est raccordée etconigurer pour que les autres l'utisent en reseau
C is the defined answer here

questions.question_text: A small workgroup inherits a second-hand printer without networking capabilities. Which of the following is the BEST method of sharing this resource among the workgroup?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
il avait deja verifier la documentation ? (qu'il le fasse d'abord...)

questions.question_text: A technician is building a new PC and notices that it has 8 DIMM sockets labeled 0 through 7. Four are white and four are blue. Which of the following should the technician do FIRST?

choices.B: Install the memory in the four blue slots
choices.A: Install the memory in the four white slots
choices.D: Install the memory in slots 0 through 3
